p: Chemical composition. Essential oil (germacrene D and β-caryophyllene as the major components) ( Ueno and Sawaya, 2019); coumarins (e.g., coumarin, trans- o-coumaric acid),; phenolic acids (e.g., chlorogenic and caffeoylquinic acids) ( Lazzari Almeida et al., 2017); terpenoids and steroids (e.g., friedelin, ent-kaurenoic acid, ent-kaur-16(17)-en-19-oic acid, ent-beyer-15(16)-en-19-oic acid, ent-15β-benzoyloxykaur16(17)-en-19-oic acid, grandifloric acid, ent-cinnamoylgrandifloric acid, ent-benzoylgrandifloric acid 17-hydroxy-ent-kaur-15(16)-en-19-oic acid, stigmasterol, β-sitosterol) ( Veneziani and Oliveira, 1999; Bertolucci et al., 2013).
